full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, , RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI LAS TSOGS BDUD RTZI'I THIGS PA LAS MAN NGAG NGO MTSAR LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI LAS TSOGS BDUD RTZI'I THIGS PA @006B LAS, ,MAN NGAG NGO MTSAR LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA DGRA BO MGO NAN PA SPYAN KA'I RGYUS PA BSREG TSUL 'DI NI, RGYAL PO AINDRA BODHI, ,MCHOD DPON BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS, ,GNYER BA BLO 'PHEL RAB RGYAL, ,BLON PO SHE DAR PI LIG THU DAS CHING HUN THAS CI SOGS SER SKYA THUN MONGS NAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^ KU SA LI DHARMA BADZRA GYIS RANG ZHAL DU MANG DAG GO ,)
